The **Seascape Explorer** will be a visualization application for exploring the seascape classes through space and time, using the R package [shiny](http://shiny.rstudio.com/).

### Preparation

See [prep](./prep.html) on manipulations to go from original Matlab (*.mat) files to using in R.
